hero.badge: New AI Video Creation Platform Launched
hero.description: Denexus is an AI video creation and distribution platform designed for TikTok e-commerce sellers. Generate quality videos with AI and match with 30,000+ US native creators.

aiEngine.description: Say goodbye to tedious editing. Let AI help you batch produce viral videos that match TikTok's algorithm.
aiEngine.feature1Desc: Submit TikTok viral videos, AI automatically analyzes the script structure and generates similar videos for your products.
aiEngine.feature2Desc: Fully AI-driven, one-click batch generation of multi-version, multi-scene HD short videos.
aiEngine.feature3Desc: Trained on massive successful video data, AI-generated content focuses on 'driving purchases', not just views.

ugc.description: Not just finding creators, but building your Denexus content matrix. AI-powered matching for efficient collaboration.
ugc.feature1Desc: Create tasks for free, set clear requirements and incentives. Creators can apply with one click.
ugc.feature2Desc: Real product demos + authentic creator narration, AI combines their personal style to produce trustworthy UGC content.
ugc.feature3Desc: No samples needed, no waiting, fully AI-generated, minimizing costs and maximizing efficiency.

pricing.title: Flexible Pricing for Every Stage
pricing.description: Choose the plan that works best for you

testimonials.description: Hear how they achieved growth with Denexus
testimonials.quote1: Denexus AI truly understands what videos sell. We tested multiple versions, and videos generated by it consistently had 50% higher click rates.
testimonials.quote2: Creator matching is very precise, and you can use AI videos as a creative foundation. Both efficiency and quality exceeded expectations.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Can't find an answer? Contact our support team anytime
faq.q1: Do unused credits roll over to the next month?
faq.a1: No, credits reset at the start of each billing cycle.
faq.q2: What if I run out of credits mid-month?
faq.a2: You can upgrade your plan or purchase additional credits.
faq.q3: How is the billing cycle calculated?
faq.a3: From purchase date, monthly plans are 30 days, yearly plans are 360 days.
faq.q4: Can I get a refund after purchase?
faq.a4: Purchases are non-refundable. Please consider carefully before buying.

cta.description: Say goodbye to content anxiety. Reach your target customers efficiently.
cta.note: No credit card required · Free trial · Cancel anytime
